comments:
Build: I200406231200

I found this stack trace in my log file. It appeared twice, with about a second
in between the two. I don't know what I was doing at the time:

java.lang.NullPointerException

	at java.lang.Throwable.<init>(Throwable.java)

There are two problems here
a) the ProjectionViewer.setRangeIndication should be protected against
projection model being null

b) the segmented mode tool bar button should be removed or disabled when opening
external file with he Java editor.

I also fixed the segmented toolbar enablement, but this only works if editor
isn't reused. See separate bug  for this.

Fix is trivial.
*** Bug 72914 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
